options.name: Disable Recoil
options.tooltip: Stops firearms from kicking up when shooting.

options.name: Instant Bullets
options.tooltip: Bullets hit targets instantly with no travel time.

options.name: Accurate Shotguns
options.tooltip: Removes shotgun spread so every bullet hits the exact center of the crosshair, making shotguns extremely powerful. Note: This makes the Freelancer 'Collateral Kill - Firearms' objective impossible to complete with shotguns.
